latex:
For which non-zero real numbers $ x$ is $ \frac{|x-|x|\-|}{x}$ a positive integers?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \text{for negative } x \text{ only} \qquad$\\
$ \textbf{(B)}\ \text{for positive } x \text{ only} \qquad$\\
$ \textbf{(C)}\ \text{only for } x \text{ an even integer} \qquad$\\
$ \textbf{(D)}\ \text{for all non-zero real numbers } x$\\
$ \textbf{(E)}\ \text{for no non-zero real numbers } x$
